attributes.action: Recognise the need for dental identification
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir, I petition that a greater requirment can be made to assist the police in their duties by recognising the fact that the tatooing of dentures (false teeth inner plate), by the use of national insurance numbers. This would not be detrimental or visual and assist the police in identification of bodies, pesonnal, missing persons,or unfortunate military service personnel, plus further means of identification.
